moves.name: Gunk Shot
moves.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Wring Out
moves.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater this attack's power.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

moves.name: Spit Up
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Swallow
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

moves.name: Belch
moves.description: The user lets out a damaging belch on the target. The user must eat a Berry to use this move.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

moves.name: Wring Out
moves.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater this attack's power.

moves.name: Gunk Shot
moves.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. It may also poison the target.
